code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../auth/AuthContext';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LoginPage(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login',{email,password});login(res.data.token);navigate('/dashboard');}catch(err){alert('Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),type:"email",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Email",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),type:"password",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Password",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-3",children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/signup",children:"Sign up here"})]})]})})});}export default LoginPage;
